main event: A civilian reported observing a bright white light that turned at a right angle and disappeared instantaneously to the south in Omaha, Nebraska on August 3, 1967.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a quarter when held at arm's length.
The object had an amber color underneath.
The object was visible for 30-40 seconds and moved from west to east, then north to south.
The observer, a housewife, was described as speaking sincerely and in a credible manner.
There was no physical evidence offered in connection with this sighting.
sighted object: bright white light that turned at a right angle and disappeared instantaneously
